system.description: The character has enhanced cybernetic systems that allow for advanced bio-repair functions through meditation and machine communion.
system.benefit: The Character can spend 10 minutes in meditation and make a Tech-Use Tetst. If successful they heal 1d5 damage immediately, if they roll 96+, they lose the ability to use their Autosanguine and Prosanguine for one week.
system.notes: Requires Autosanguine Trait/Implant and Mechanicus Implant

rollConfig.description: Make a Tech-Use Test after 10 minutes meditation to heal 1d5 damage

specialAbilities.name: Prosanguine Healing
specialAbilities.description: Spend 10 minutes in meditation and make a Tech-Use Test. On success, heal 1d5 damage. On a roll of 96+, lose Autosanguine and Prosanguine abilities for one week.
